thread.title: How the MSM Covered Illegals’ Alleged Rape of 14 Year-Old Is Downright Sickening
thread.title_full: How the MSM Covered Illegals’ Alleged Rape of 14 Year-Old Is Downright Sickening

author: Gabrielle Cintorino
title: How the MSM Covered Illegals’ Alleged Rape of 14 Year-Old Is Downright Sickening
text:
After Trump, Canada Decides THEY Want to Start Deporting Illegals 
NewsBusters reported on the incident and criticized the liberal media for largely failing to report the alleged rape, especially compared to the coverage the major networks, ABC, CBS and NBC have given to reports of sexual assaults at college fraternities. 
While the networks have ignored the Rockville rape story, all three gave copious coverage to the now-infamous 2014 report in Rolling Stone magazine of a brutal rape on the campus of the University of Virginia that turned out to have no truth to it. 
Altogether, the networks gave 10 minutes of coverage to this fake story in the initial days after Rolling Stone published it on Nov. 19, 2014. Advertisement - story continues below 
NewsBusters reported that on Nov. 23 and 24, 2014, ABC’s “World News Tonight” spent 4 minutes and 30 seconds reporting the UVA rape story. “NBC Nightly News” spent 4 minutes and 16 seconds on the report, while the “CBS Evening News” had 1 minute and 56 seconds of coverage on what turned out to be a total fabrication. 
It seems as if the rape story at Rockville High School did not fit the liberal media’s narrative that President Donald Trump is wrong about illegal immigrants bringing crime into the United States. 
In fact, major news networks have spent their time since the beginning of Trump’s presidency criticizing him for his efforts to secure the country’s southern border from potential criminals. 
Isn’t it time that Americans band together and demand the national media report the facts? Advertisement - story continues below
